original_title: Naked and Funny Special 9. Caught In The Buff
overview: They say you should always dress for success, and if you’re a smokin’ hot girl on our show, the only dress you’ll need is…a birthday suit! Yep, these funny, fantastic frauleins are playing hidden camera jokes in various and sexy states of undress on gullible guys who literally can’t believe their eyes. You won’t believe your luck at having the good sense to watch “Naked & Funny: Caught In The Buff” as soon as you can!
title: Naked and Funny Special 9. Caught In The Buff
